movies.title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
movies.description: Sequel to the 2023 horror hit, this installment returns to the haunted pizzeria where murderous animatronics once again terrorize night security staff and those who dare to uncover its dark secrets.

movies.title: Jujutsu Kaisen: Execution
movies.description: Feature-length anime entry in the Jujutsu Kaisen franchise, following sorcerers as they confront a powerful new curse in a high-stakes mission that tests their skills and loyalties.

movies.title: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair
movies.description: A combined cut of Kill Bill: Vol. 1 and Vol. 2, this re-release presents Quentin Tarantino's revenge saga about a former assassin known as The Bride who hunts down her ex-crew and their leader, Bill.

movies.title: Merrily We Roll Along
movies.description: Adapted from the Stephen Sondheim musical and filmed over many years, the story traces the lives and fractured friendship of three creative collaborators in reverse chronology, from disillusioned middle age back to youthful idealism.

movies.title: 100 Nights of Hero
movies.description: A fantasy romance in which a storyteller spins a cycle of tales over one hundred nights to protect a woman from a predatory ruler, blending feminist mythmaking with lush, storybook imagery.

movies.title: MONSTA X: CONNECT x in CINEMAS
movies.description: Concert documentary featuring K-pop group Monsta X, showcasing performances and behind-the-scenes footage from their CONNECT x tour for fans worldwide.

movies.title: Viva Verdi
movies.description: Documentary centered on the legacy and enduring influence of composer Giuseppe Verdi, weaving archival material and commentary from musicians and scholars.

movies.title: Wedding Crashers 20th Anniversary
movies.description: Special 20th anniversary re-release of the 2005 comedy about two divorce mediators who crash weddings for fun until one of them unexpectedly falls in love.

movies.title: Fackham Hall
movies.description: A period comedy riffing on British upstairs-downstairs tropes, following a young servant who gets entangled in the ridiculous scandals of an eccentric aristocratic family at Fackham Hall.

movies.title: Dhurandhar
movies.description: Indian action-thriller about a formidable fixer whose criminal empire is threatened by a high-stakes conspiracy, forcing uneasy alliances and explosive showdowns.

movies.title: Man Finds Tape
movies.description: A man discovers a disturbing VHS tape that appears to show real violence, drawing him into a nightmarish investigation that blurs the line between recorded horror and reality.

movies.title: The Chronology of Water
movies.description: Adapted from Lidia Yuknavitch’s memoir, the film charts a woman’s turbulent coming-of-age through trauma, addiction, and art as she reconstructs her identity around swimming and storytelling.

movies.title: La Grazia
movies.description: Italian drama about a small-town man whose life is upended by an unexpected event he interprets as a miracle, forcing the community to confront questions of faith and morality.

movies.title: Little Trouble Girls
movies.description: Intimate European coming-of-age drama about two adolescent girls whose intense friendship is tested by family pressures and the confusing transition into adulthood.

movies.title: Come Closer
movies.description: A romantic drama about two people whose chance meeting gradually develops into a complicated relationship, forcing them to confront past wounds and shifting family dynamics.

movies.title: Boil Alert
movies.description: Documentary examining water crises in Indigenous communities, following activists and residents as they fight long-term boil water advisories and advocate for environmental justice.

movies.title: Rosemead
movies.description: Crime thriller set in the Asian American community of Rosemead, where a woman becomes entangled in a dangerous underworld while trying to protect her family from escalating threats.

movies.title: Dust Bunny
movies.description: A horror-thriller about a young girl who believes a monster under her bed killed her family and turns to a mysterious neighbor, a retired assassin, to help destroy the creature.

movies.title: Frontier Crucible
movies.description: Western thriller in which settlers in a remote frontier outpost face violence, betrayal, and moral tests as lawlessness and harsh conditions close in on them.

movies.title: Under Current
movies.description: Chinese-language thriller following a group of men whose intertwined pasts resurface amid a dangerous underworld scheme, forcing old loyalties and rivalries into the open.

movies.title: Eastern Western
movies.description: Family-oriented western adventure about a young outsider who journeys across rugged landscapes and finds unexpected community and purpose on the frontier.

movies.title: Laalo: Krishna Sada Sahaayate
movies.description: Faith-based family film focused on devotion to Krishna, following a young believer whose spiritual journey affects their family and community.

movies.title: UFC 323: Dvalishvili vs. Yan 2
movies.description: Special event cinema presentation of the UFC 323 fight card headlined by the rematch between Merab Dvalishvili and Petr Yan, broadcast live to theaters.

movies.title: Andre Rieu's 2025 Christmas Concert: Merry Christmas
movies.description: Holiday concert film featuring violinist and conductor André Rieu performing Christmas classics with his Johann Strauss Orchestra in a festive staging.
